Description: Blue faience flask with decorated rim and neck and antelope-head handle. It has hieroglyphic inscriptions on the shoulders which express New Year greetings.
Bibliographic references: Bartoloni et al 2000a / Principi etruschi tra Mediterraneo ed Europa (cat.414, p.302) (entry by Judith Swaddling)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2000-2001 1Oct-1 Apr, Bologna, Museo Civico Archeologico, 'Principi etruschi tra Mediterraneo ed Europa' 2012 19 Jun-25 Nov, Montreal Museum of Archaeology and History, Etruscan Civilisation
